screen_desc: This screenshot shows a mobile cart screen from Target. The item "Duracell Coppertop AAA Batteries - 10 Pack" has been successfully added to the cart. There is an option to choose "Pick it up instead" for store pickup at Cedar Rapids South. Below, there are options to either continue shopping or proceed to checkout. Additional items are shown in the "Frequently also added" section.
action_think: The current screen is from Target, not Amazon, and the task requires navigating to Amazon and adding an item to the cart. Therefore, the next step should be to switch to the Amazon app and initiate the search for the Razer Nari.
action_plan: Go back to the home screen and open the Amazon app.
Select the first item in the search results.
Add the item to the shopping cart.

action_result:
By clicking on the icon located at the top of the last screen, you have navigated to a search bar where you can input a query. This action is directly relevant to completing the user request because it allows you to search for the "Razer Nari" product on Amazon, which is a necessary step for adding it to the cart.
